A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was horrible! I have been a Star Wars fan since 1977. I’ve owned every copy of the Star Wars movies from VHS to Blu-Ray and have seen them hundreds of times. I’ve watched all of the movies with my children since they were born and when old enough we’ve been to see them in the theaters. This movie is the only copy I do not own or even care to. This is the only Star Wars movie I have only seen once. Rian Johnson has no business directing any Star Wars movies period. I’ve seen fan made films that were much better.
